title: Integral Function Block
description:
SPEED converts various common units in the units for speed.
Normally, only the input to be converted is occupied and the remaining in-
puts remain free. However, if several inputs loaded with values, the values
of all inputs are converted accordingly and then summed.
1 ms = meters / second = 3.6 km / h
1 kmh = kilometers / hour = 1 / 3, 6 m / s
1 knot = knot = 1 nautical mile / hour = 0.5144 m / s
Mh = 1 mile per hour = 0.44704 m / s
name: FT_INT2

input.name: IN
input.description: The real input value to be integrated.

input.name: K
input.description: A scaling factor for the integration process. Default is 1.0.

input.name: RUN
input.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the integration should be performed. Default is TRUE.

input.name: RST
input.description: Boolean flag to reset the integration process when TRUE.

input.name: OUT_MIN
input.description: The minimum limit for the output value. Default is -1E+38.

input.name: OUT_MAX
input.description: The maximum limit for the output value. Default is 1E+38.

output.name: OUT
output.description: The result of the integration process.

output.name: LIM
output.description: Boolean flag indicating whether the output value is within the specified limits.
